Analytics, Data Science, Data Management Training May 7-12 in Chicago – save 30% with KDnuggets offer

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Analytics, Chicago, Data Science, IL, TDWI, Training

TDWI comes to Chicago May 7-12, and KDnuggets readers get special savings! Save 30% through next Friday, March 24 using priority code KDSAVE30. Did you know that teams of 3+ save an extra 10%?


 
Don't miss out on maximum savings in data science, analytics, data management,
governance and more
through March 24.

 
 
 
KDnuggets Special Savings!
Save 30% through next Friday, March 24
Use priority code KDSAVE30
Did you know– teams of 3+ save an extra 10%?


 
 
 
REGISTER NOW
 
 
Modernize Your Data Ecosystem
 
TDWI Chicago focuses on the challenges and opportunities facing today’s data-driven organizations and the topics you care about: data science, analytics, data management, governance and more.
  • Enhance your skills and insights with 55+ sessions
  • Half and full-day courses provide deep education and insights you can put to you use immediately
  • Courses taught by our expert TDWI faculty and industry experts who have been there, done that
 
 
 
Earn Your Data Modeling Certificate
 
NEW! Immerse yourself in data modeling with this 4-day intensive certificate program at TDWI Chicago.

Earn 32 Continuing Professional Education (CPE) credits.
 
MORE INFO
 
 
Attend the Leadership Summit
 
The TDWI Leadership Summit in Chicago will help business, IT, and analytics leaders modernize data ecosystems, solve new technical challenges and leverage data for new competitive advantages.
 
VIEW AGENDA
 
 
4 Core Learning Tracks
 
Every role in data from analysts and architects to analytics directors and IT managers will find content to drive personal and professional growth.
 
 
Data Architecture & Storage
 
As big data, self-service analytics, data lakes, cloud, and other leading edge practices become mainstream, understanding the most effective storage techniques and architectures to support these changes are key to your big data success.
Data Management & Governance
 
Rethink data management and governance to meet your security, privacy, compliance, and data quality needs in the complex world of self-service, big data, and data in the cloud.
 
Big Data & Analytics
 
The future of big data analytics is here. Explore the latest skills in predictive analysis and other techniques to help you deliver high-impact insights from big data.
Data-Driven Data Strategy
 
Becoming a successful data driven organization takes more than data and technology. Learn how to bring people, organizations, and data strategy together to build a highly effective data driven organization.
 
 
 
 
 
 
VIEW AGENDA
 
 
KDnuggets Member Save Big!
Save 30% through March 24 with priority code KDSAVE30
 
 
 
 
 
 
About TDWI
 
To review our Privacy Policy, please visit our website. 1105 Media, Inc., 9201 Oakdale Ave., Chatsworth, CA 91311
 
To know more or contact us for our services, just drop us a line at info@tdwi.org
 
©2017 TDWI. All rights reserved.
Contact Us  |  Privacy Policy
